resources.string:
ptMobile is a simple pivotaltracker client for android.

Since this is a beta release, ptMobile is lacking some important features at the moment.

Feedback, bug reports, feature requests are always welcome.

Yours
Niels

Visit me on www.linnemann.me/ptMobile
Thanks to:\n- pivotallabs for constantly improving pivotaltracker\n- Dennis Pollack, who created the ptMobile Logo
